Chicken BurgerðŸ˜‹ \n
Price : 250TK
\n Nothing beats a simple hamburger on a warm summer evening! Ground beef is blended with an easy to prepare bread crumb mixture. Pile these burgers with your favorite condiments, pop open a cool drink and enjoy!

FUSILLI CREAMY CHICKEN PASTAðŸ˜‹\n
Price : 180TK
\n Fusilli (Spiral Pasta) in a cream sauce with chargrilled chicken, sauteed mushrooms, onions, fresh cream, Bechamel and parmesan cheese cooked with a blend of spices.

Grilled ChickenðŸ˜‹\n
Price : 110TK
\n This grilled chicken breast recipe is boneless skinless chicken breasts soaked in a flavorful garlic and herb marinade, then grilled to brown perfection.

Chicken NachosðŸ˜‹\n
Price : 290TK\n Crispy tortilla chips are topped together with seasoned chicken, cheese and other favorite nacho toppings.
